name: ChampConnect
description:
You need to find the champion name that appears at the top.
Select one of the champion names from the list of 3 options below, so that it appears in the boxes above, then select any box that contains a letter (of the champion you selected from the list), the list of 3 options below will refresh according to the letter you select (names of champions that have that letter in that position will appear in alphabetical order). You get 100 points for finding the name of the champion that comes up, once you find 3, the final score is shown, from which the seconds and the moves you made in total are subtracted.
This is version 1.0 of the game.
Enjoy :)
